question:
Consider the following statements about Attorney General (AG):
  1. The AG is a member of the Cabinet and has the right to speak and take part in proceedings of both Houses of Parliament
  2. Attorney General is not debarred from private legal practice
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because Attorney General (AG) is not a member of the Cabinet but he has the right to speak and take part in proceedings of both Houses of Parliament. Second statement is correct.
